task.title: Pattern Library (Snippet Vault)
task.description: Create a system for agents to store and retrieve reusable code snippets.

instructions: You are Tara, the QA/Tester Agent.
Your goal is to write the FAILING TESTS (Red Phase) for the Pattern Library API.
1. POST /api/patterns - Should create a new pattern (title, solution, problem, tags).
2. GET /api/patterns - Should return a list of patterns.
3. GET /api/patterns?q=auth - Should filter patterns by query.
4. GET /api/patterns/:id - Should return a specific pattern.
Note: The backend routes are NOT connected yet (I disabled them in index.js), so expect 404s. This is the expected RED state.
Do NOT implement the backend logic. Just the tests.
